statements: SELECT * FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE conference_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, teacher_name FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE teacher_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT parent_name, conference_date FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE conference_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE agenda IS NOT NULL;
SELECT conference_id, parent_name, teacher_name, conference_date FROM parent_teacher_conferences ORDER BY conference_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE parent_name='Alice'
SELECT teacher_name, conference_date FROM parent_teacher_conferences ORDER BY conference_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE agenda IS NOT NULL
SELECT parent_name, teacher_name FROM parent_teacher_conferences WHERE conference_date > '2021-09-01'
SELECT MAX(conference_id) AS max_conference_id FROM parent_teacher_conferences
SELECT conference_id, parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_conferences;
SELECT * FROM parent_conferences WHERE scheduled_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teacher_availability ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone FROM parent_conferences WHERE parent_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM teacher_availability WHERE available_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT * FROM parent_conferences WHERE conference_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_conferences WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT parent_name, parent_phone FROM parent_conferences WHERE parent_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM parent_conferences ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, available_date FROM teacher_availability WHERE teacher_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM parent_table
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_table
SELECT teacher_id, teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teacher_table
SELECT conference_id, conference_date FROM conference_table
SELECT parent_id, teacher_id, conference_date FROM conference_table
SELECT * FROM parent_table JOIN teacher_table ON parent_table.parent_id = teacher_table.teacher_id;
SELECT parent_id, parent_name, parent_email FROM parent_table WHERE parent_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT parent_name, teacher_name FROM parent_table JOIN teacher_table ON parent_table.parent_id = teacher_table.teacher_id WHERE parent_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM conference_table WHERE conference_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY conference_date DESC;

SELECT teacher_name, COUNT(conference_id) AS conference_count FROM teacher_table JOIN conference_table ON teacher_table.teacher_id = conference_table.teacher_id GROUP BY teacher_name HAVING COUNT(conference_id) > 5;
SELECT * FROM parent;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM parent WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM teacher ORDER BY teacher_name DESC;
SELECT parent_name, teacher_name, scheduled_time FROM parent JOIN conference_schedule ON parent.parent_id = conference_schedule.parent_id;
SELECT parent_name, teacher_name, attended FROM parent JOIN conference_attendance ON parent.parent_id = conference_attendance.parent_id AND teacher_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM parent ORDER BY parent_id DESC;
SELECT parent_name, email FROM parent WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT teacher_name, subject_taught FROM teacher ORDER BY teacher_name ASC;
SELECT parent.parent_name, teacher.teacher_name FROM parent JOIN teacher ON parent.parent_id = teacher.teacher_id;

SELECT parent.parent_name, teacher.teacher_name, conference_schedule.scheduled_time FROM parent JOIN conference_schedule ON parent.parent_id = conference_schedule.parent_id JOIN teacher ON conference_schedule.teacher_id = teacher.teacher_id ORDER BY conference_schedule.scheduled_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM parents;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT room_name, room_location, max_capacity FROM conference_rooms WHERE max_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY room_name ASC;
SELECT schedule_id, conference_date, start_time, end_time FROM conference_schedules WHERE conference_date >= '2022-08-15' AND conference_date <= '2022-09-15';
SELECT * FROM parents WHERE parent_id = 1;
SELECT parent_name, parent_email FROM parents ORDER BY parent_name DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_email FROM teachers WHERE teacher_id > 5 AND teacher_id < 10;
SELECT room_name, room_location, max_capacity FROM conference_rooms WHERE max_capacity >= 50 ORDER BY room_location ASC;

SELECT schedule_id, conference_date, start_time, end_time FROM conference_schedules JOIN agenda_items ON conference_schedules.schedule_id = agenda_items.schedule_id WHERE agenda_items.item_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY schedule_id ASC;
